title: Bug: meet Error when running "uer/gpt2-chinese-cluecorpussmall" from hugging face
body:
Code
```python
from transformers import AutoTokenizer, AutoModelForCausalLM, TextGenerationPipeline
tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained("uer/gpt2-chinese-cluecorpussmall")
model = AutoModelForCausalLM.from_pretrained("uer/gpt2-chinese-cluecorpussmall")
text_generator = TextGenerationPipeline(model, tokenizer)
print(text_generator("我", min_length=100, do_sample=True))
```

Error message
```bash
$ python test.py 
Setting `pad_token_id` to `eos_token_id`:50256 for open-end generation.
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test.py", line 5, in <module>
    print(text_generator("我", min_length=100, do_sample=True))
  File "C:\Users\neal\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\transformers\pipelines\text_generation.py", line 147, in __call__ 
    output_sequences = self.model.generate(input_ids=input_ids, **generate_kwargs)  # BS x SL
  File "C:\Users\neal\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\torch\autograd\grad_mode.py", line 27, in decorate_context        
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Users\neal\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\transformers\generation_utils.py", line 940, in generate
    **model_kwargs,
  File "C:\Users\neal\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\transformers\generation_utils.py", line 1390, in sample
    next_token_scores = logits_processor(input_ids, next_token_logits)
  File "C:\Users\neal\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\transformers\generation_logits_process.py", line 89, in __call__  
    scores = processor(input_ids, scores)
  File "C:\Users\neal\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\transformers\generation_logits_process.py", line 117, in __call__ 
    scores[:, self.eos_token_id] = -float("inf")
IndexError: index 50256 is out of bounds for dimension 1 with size 21128
```

Seems like `pad_token_id` is set to `50256`, which is out of the total vocab size (21128).
Is my usage wrong? Or do I need to update something in the `config.json` from hugging face?
